gedit.name: gedit
gedit.description: gedit is a simple text editing tool similar to Microsoft Notepad

gimp.name: GIMP
gimp.description: GNU Image Manipulation Program is a Photo Manipulation tool similar to Adobe Photoshop

firefox.name: Firefox
firefox.description: Firefox is a free and open-source web browser developed by the Mozilla Foundation

xterm.name: Xterm
xterm.description: Xterm is the standard terminal emulator for the X Window System

inkscape.name: Inkscape
inkscape.description: Inkscape is a free and open-source vector graphics editor used to create vector images.

openshot.name: OpenShot
openshot.description: OpenShot Video Editor is a free and open-source video editor

blender.name: Blender
blender.description: Blender is a free and open-source 3D computer graphics software toolset

xfce4.name: Xfce4
xfce4.description: Xfce4 is a free and open-source desktop environment for Unix-like operating systems
